right.text: that was awesome, what an asshole.

left.text: one of the worst bullies I had throughout elementary school hung himself when I started junior high

right.text: but then the tree got bulldozed to make room for an expansion for the school.

left.text: they planted a tree in his memory...

right.text: that would be sort of like dedicating a new school pool to a kid who drowned himself

left.text: a tree would not exactly be my first choice of commemorative medium for someone who hung himself.
